about_the_game:
The Steam release of Catching Moments.

Catching Moments is a song written by the main character and Amelia Sweet in Daring Academy, composed and written by Saddle Studios and Thediamondcrystal and sung by Zoemaria44. This is a song written when they were 13-14 years old, and is about their friendship, how it is still going strong even after many years of support, care and such.

This song was made for the Daring Academy visual novel game.

Official lyrics for this song are available on Genius. Click the "View the quick reference" button to access it.

Catching Moments includes the full album both MP3 and FLAC files.
